greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(2n+1) = 2n+1, a(2n) = A053669(2n) * a(A111701(2n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2310
formula: If n is odd, a(n) = n, and when even, a(n) = A053669(n) * a(A111701(n)).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 23 2016
